thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 19 of 573
thread.title: Lilly

author: Lilly
title: Lilly
text: My daughter just ordered a prom dress and it came looking as it did online. She is very happy with it !!! We ordered a size based off of what size she normally wears in dresses and the dress fits her perfectly. Only the length needs to be adjusted. According to the measuring chart online we would have had to order a bigger size so for us going with the size she usually wears was the way to go.
